concept.title: Create a Sauce Labs custom profile using custom desired capabilities

conbody.p: You can also create a new Sauce Labs custom profile using custom desired capabilities. To do so:

li.p: Go to Projects > Settings > Desired Capabilities > Custom.
Click Add, then name the new custom profile with the following syntax: saucelabs_<your-custom-profile-name>. Here, we name our profile saucelabs_custom.
Click on More (...) under the Value column. In the Custom Execution Configuration Builder dialog, click Add, then choose Remote.
Click on More (...) under the Preferences column. In the pop-up Driver Builder dialog, specify as follows:

ul.li: Remote server URL: specify the Driver Creation URL in Sauce Labs. To find the Driver Creation URL, open your Sauce Labs account, go to Account > User settings, then scroll to the Driver Creation section.

image.alt: Add Sauce Labs custom profile via desired capabilities

li.p: Specify your Sauce Labs username, accessKey.

ul.li: Add other properties for your execution environment. You can refer to the Sauce Labs platform configuration here: Platform configuration.

li.p: Add Sauce Labs custom profile via desired capabilities`
You can now use the newly created profile to execute tests.
